page.title: 05EAST HULL POLICE STATION
page.content: Tower Grange Police Station is one of the stations in the Humberside Police Authority. It has to police the whole of East Hull and Holderness. It is a modern building on Holderness Road. As the area contains a large population, much industry, the docks and the prison the station is a busy one. The staff of the station are split into three main sections: {Community}Policemen, who deal with most of the normal day to day stuff. Sometimes called "Beat Bobbies". {Traffic}Policemen, specialise in traffic offences. {Criminal Investigation Department {(CID).}Serious crimes. To help them they can call on several specialist departments: dogs, horses, drugs, underwater search, forensic, special branch and others.
